name: Train Crawl
description:
Kill monsters, grab loot, and crawl through a dangerous train!

Use the arrow keys to move, [Z] to attack, and [X] to pick up weapons.

Train Crawl was made for Train Jam 2019 (the one with the tons of delays, haha) and was a blast to work on. I worked with a some amazing people, and we made something I'm pretty proud of!

Made by

Lucas "@LukBebalduk3" Demo
Jordan "@Wavestormed" Kegler
Ovie "@Libaari" Mukoro
Yukon "@YWainczak" Wainczak
Maize "@MaizeWallin" Wallin
